# Unit 5: More Hurricanes & Blizzards in NYC? {.unnumbered}

## Driving Question

> **Will climate change bring more extreme weather to New York City?**

## Unit Overview

In this unit, we analyze patterns in severe weather and investigate how climate change may be affecting the frequency and intensity of storms that impact the northeastern United States.

## What You'll Learn

- How severe weather systems form and develop
- The relationship between climate change and storm patterns
- How to analyze weather data for trends
- The impacts of extreme weather on urban areas
